review: This is very good hotel with very nice room and everything is very clean and well maintained. The main benefit of this hotel is the great garden with terrace and grass, trees and flowers where you can sit in the shadow and relax.  Excellent.
name: Amos G

HERE IS MY TRUE DETAILS  I was compassionately welcomed, and when I might find difficult trekking or taxis difficulties, NAGESH👍 🏠USED TO GO PERSONALISED CONTACTING PEOPLE AT Padum,🏠Town 2kms away and  fulfilling all needs. This is a classic natural elements  Nagesh 👍💒 have and therefore lots of foreign country tourist visit here fly here even in cold weather September to March  It is alike melody music and magnetic moments your span in life when you come here. 😊thanks , NAGESH ,
name: ZAGREUS Z

review: L'hôtel est bien situé, un peu à l'écart de Padum, à 100 m à pied d'un joli petit temple sur un promontoire entouré d'un village.   La jeune équipe, managée par un jeune homme du coin, est sympa et motivée... Le restaurant pas mal. Il faut dire qu'à Padum, il n'y a pas énormément d'endroit ou aller diner...  Une partie de l'hôtel lorsque nous y sommes resté en aout 2017 était encore en construction. Donc il y avait encore pas mal de petits problèmes...  Mais l'ensemble est prometteur et je ne doute pas que les petits soucis seront réglés progressivement. N'oubliez pas que vous êtes ici un peu "au bout du monde".  C'est un peu plus difficile de construire un hôtel ici qu'à Leh !
name: VibertParis

review: Our travel agent had told us this was the best place in town and looking at the website you would agree. Having planned to spend 4 nights at this guesthouse we ran away screaming however after 3, preferring a 10 hour drive to Kargil over another nights stay. On arrival it was immediately clear that they were doing construction works. The smell and the dust of cement were everywhere. Since we (me, my wife and the guide) were the only guests, they offered us what they called - their best room - and we could see them cleaning it with the vacuum cleaner. So, okay, we decided to give it a try, only to find out that there was dust everywhere - so much it made breathing in the room difficult. The glass in the windows is not properly mounted, so with the dry climate, the wind and the
name: Travelman-Tx

review: Die beiden Hausteile sind noch nicht ganz fertig gestellt, werden aber bereits erweitert. Die Zimmer sind sauber und geräumig aber einfach. Fließend warmes Wasser gibt es (noch) nicht, man bekommt aber jederzeit einen Eimer heißen Wasser ins Zimmer geliefert.   Erstklassiges Essen im schön eingerichteten Lokal.  Unweit des Hauses die schöne Pibiting Gompa.
name: Weitweitweg
